vsParam:
The classroom cleaning is checked.
The next one is...

Hazel! The questionnaires concerning the
new menu of the canteen are all given out!

Thank you. Let's wait for the statistics. Right, we have
to prepare the teaching supplies in classrooms.

Ah, this is the checklist for classroom cleaning. Can you
submit it to the Lecturer Office when you are done?

Hazel... She's always busy with the Student Union's
work whenever we see her.
But I heard that Hazel's a straight A student.

Uh, really? Look how busy she is.
Does she really have time to study?

Perfect timing. I have an assignment which requires
a field investigation into monsters.

I need more hands.
Come on, go with me.

Uh, wait, Hazel!?
We haven't said yes...

You said anything?
Alright, let's go.
Sorel and you guys, come with me!?

Uh, you are pretty cooperative today.
That's the right attitude, [px].

Boohoo, what will she make us do...
Anyway, good luck to us!

Right. That's the monster specified in the assignment!
We must investigate while fighting it. Got it?

What!? Investigate while fighting!?
Uh, let's do this, [px]!

That's it for the report. Thank you for helping
me with the investigation, [px].

Ah, ha ha ha, you are welcome...
But I think we also helped with the report...

Alright, I'm going to submit the assignment. Come with me.
Viewing assignments of other disciplines is also a type of learning.

Sorry to disturb you, Ru Sensei.
I'm here to submit my assignment.

Ah, Hazel. Seems you have brought
many people here. Never mind.

Ru Sensei is very strict. I wonder what evaluation
he will give. I'm nervous...

... Mmm, good.
It's well-organized and easy to understand.

The points in the report show that you're very observant.
No wonder you're the chief candidate of this year.

Thank you, Ru Sensei.
I'll keep it up.

C-chief... So it means Hazel
is the top-performing student in the Academy!?

Ho ho. As the Student Union President, this is expected of me.
I must be everyone's example.

You are the Student Union President, and the chief candidate...
So no one dares oppose you in the Academy, right?

I don't know about that... So, [px],
can I count on you if I need help next time?

Ah, Hazel Senpai! I don't know how to categorize and archive this
document. It's an old notice...

Which one?
Let me see. I'll teach you how to categorize.

Hazel is indeed a straight A student...
That makes us no choice but to obey her, hahaha...
